text: @realDonaldTrump Laying groundwork in case you loose? WW1 and WW2 are bad examples. Actual battles never really reached our soil so Americans were relatively safe going out to vote. In a mature democracy we should not need to risk our lives to vote. Can you guarantee our safety from #COVID19?
